translation.en: Now, the story goes that John Denver,
translation.zh: 故事是这样的 约翰·丹沃

translation.en: he was playing at this little ol' place called the Cellar Door in Washington DC,

translation.en: around Christmas time in 1970.
translation.zh: 在1970年圣诞节前后

translation.en: His opening act was this husband and wife duo,

translation.en: named Bill Danoff and Taffy Nivert,

translation.en: and they called themself Fat City.

translation.en: That's kind of a funny name.

translation.en: Yeah, that is kind of a funny name. Socket, 5/8ths.

translation.en: Now, one night, they decide to go on back to the house,

translation.en: and have a little jam session.

translation.en: On the way, they got in an accident,

translation.en: and John Denver, he broke his thumb.

translation.en: And when they finally got back to the house,

translation.en: and Bill and Taffy played him,

translation.en: played John Denver this song they'd been working on,

translation.en: he flipped for it, man.
translation.zh: 他为之疯狂 天啊

translation.en: And they worked on that thing till dawn.
translation.zh: 他们彻夜改进这首歌 直到天亮

translation.en: Screwdriver.
translation.zh: 螺丝刀

translation.en: -Flat head or Phillips? -Flat.
translation.zh: -一字型还是十字型？ -一字型

translation.en: So, that's why you like the song.
translation.zh: 所以你才喜欢这首歌

translation.en: Well, I like the song because of the song.

translation.en: I mean, I guess I also like it 'cause it's got a story behind it.
translation.zh: 我是说 我想我喜欢它 也是因为它背后有故事

translation.en: You know, Bill Danoff later said that he ain't never even been to West Virginia.

translation.en: but I don't really think it'll work for the pageant.

translation.en: if she and Moody would pay for your cell phone.

translation.en: Gun show!

translation.en: -Hey, Daddy. -Nope.

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Yeah. Have a seat.

translation.en: -when you were first brought on. -No.

translation.en: This big, and you let me drive my truck around the track.

translation.en: Look, it's a four-wheel drive. It isn't gonna hurt you.

translation.en: Almost heaven

translation.en: West Virginia
translation.zh: 西佛吉尼亚州

translation.en: Blue Ridge Mountains Shenandoah River

translation.en: Whenever they'd show the games here local, we'd watch.

translation.en: Of course, for me, it was all about the uniforms.

translation.en: Their jerseys are the most striking shade of purple.

translation.en: Purple.

translation.en: Yes. Purple and gold. Royal colors.

translation.en: Yeah, I got off early,

translation.en: so I figured I'd take Sadie on over to her dance thing,

translation.en: so you didn't have to drive her.

translation.en: That's great and all, you wanting to see your daughter dance and everything.

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 靠

translation.en: Excuse you.

translation.en: I got her there fine, by the way.

translation.en: See, most people think if you're gonna go to Charleston,

translation.en: then, duh, you get on the 85 to Danville,

translation.en: then the I-19 to Charleston, 54 miles.

translation.en: But being 4:00 p.m.,

translation.en: I knew not the best time of day to be on the road.

translation.en: And they're still doing all that shoulder work on the I-19.

translation.en: Plus, then you got the sun right in your eyes
translation.zh: 而且在朱利安之外的部分

translation.en: for that whole stretch outside of Julian.

translation.en: So, yeah, I took the 85 to Danville,

translation.en: so instead of going up and over, I'm going over and then up.

translation.en: After that, it was just a straight shot on Daniel Boone Parkway

translation.en: all the way to Marmet.

translation.en: Well, sure sounds like you love to drive.

translation.en: But I don't like 'em.
translation.zh: 但我不喜欢

translation.en: -Yeah. -Don't laugh at me!

translation.en: Moody's expanding.

translation.en: That's across state line.

translation.en: Hell, no, you can't just tell me that like I ain't got no say in the matter.

translation.en: -What do you say there, Earl? -Hey, Jimmy.

translation.en: So...

translation.en: -I've been uncovering a lot. -Shit.

translation.en: Did you know Aunt Maggie, in 1983, won the Lotto.

translation.en: Well, you gotta admit this kind of stuff don't happen to normal folk.

translation.en: and a roadside mine takes my arm as I was transporting out.

translation.en: I was almost at the airport.
translation.zh: 我当时都快到机场了

translation.en: Ain't nothing bad ever happened to Mellie.

translation.en: I don't even know what I'm saying...

translation.en: I'm gonna go to my satellite office, and then we're gonna talk about this.

translation.en: See, the dirty big secret is that I am the asset in this scenario.

translation.en: It's not Dayton White. Right?

translation.en: And plus, plus, two of those kids only had one kidney to begin with.

translation.en: Why isn't anybody writing about that, right?

translation.en: It's total BS.
translation.zh: 这完全是废话

translation.en: What do you like?
translation.zh: 你想喝些什么？

translation.en: I just thought of a great song title,
translation.zh: 我刚想了个很棒的歌名

translation.en: "The Kindness of a One-Armed Bartender."
translation.zh: 《独臂酒保的善良》

translation.en: Go on!
translation.zh: 可以啊！

translation.en: Now, you see, I got two arms.
translation.zh: 你看 我有两只胳膊

translation.en: See? I'm a trans-radial amputee,
translation.zh: 看到了吗？我是桡动脉截肢者

translation.en: so it's my lower forearm and hand that's missing.
translation.zh: 所以我是少了小臂和手

translation.en: -My mistake. -I'm very lucky.
translation.zh: -我的错 -我很幸运

translation.en: I guess I'll settle for a Stoli, extra dry, two olives.
translation.zh: 我想我就来一杯斯托利 特干型 再加两颗橄榄

translation.en: Can you handle that?
translation.zh: 你能做吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Up or on the rocks?
translation.zh: -可以 -去冰还是加冰的？

translation.en: Up.
translation.zh: 去冰

translation.en: Well, it's pretty good. Could be colder.
translation.zh: 很不错 可以再凉一些

translation.en: Ice shortage around here,
translation.zh: 这里的冰短缺

translation.en: 'cause of the water contamination plant from the chemical leak upstream.
translation.zh: 因为上游的化学泄漏污染了水源

translation.en: Hey, do you mind doing that drink thing again?
translation.zh: 喂 你介意再做一杯吗？

translation.en: I want to shoot a post.
translation.zh: 我想拍个短视频

translation.en: I got 1.2 million followers. This could make you famous.
translation.zh: 我有120万粉丝 这会让你出名的

translation.en: How about he bounce a damn ball on his nose for you next,
translation.zh: 下次让他把球打在鼻子上怎么样

translation.en: like a trained seal?
translation.zh: 像一只训练有素的海豹？

translation.en: Sorry. You got a problem?
translation.zh: 抱歉 你有事吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I got a problem.
translation.zh: 是的 我有事

translation.en: I take exception to people messing with my brother.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢有人欺负我弟弟

translation.en: That's two tours in Iraq right there.
translation.zh: 那是在伊拉克执行两次任务造成的

translation.en: He stepped forward when others were stepping back.
translation.zh: 别人都在后退 他却挺身而出

translation.en: So, you need to show a little respect.
translation.zh: 所以你需要表现出一点尊重

translation.en: Thank you for your service. Cheers.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的服务 干杯

translation.en: So, brothers?
translation.zh: 你们是兄弟？

translation.en: You know, it's funny. With your bad leg,
translation.zh: 真是有趣 你的瘸腿

translation.en: and his missing an arm... Excuse me, hand.
translation.zh: 他失去的胳膊…不好意思 是手

translation.en: It's like the two of you almost add up to one normal person.
translation.zh: 就好像你们两个加起来 才是一个正常人

translation.en: Man, I know who you are.
translation.zh: 兄弟 我知道你是谁

translation.en: You're that guy on the TV with the drink.
translation.zh: 你就是电视上喝酒的那个人

translation.en: I mean, you're famous!
translation.zh: 我是说 你很有名！

translation.en: Right on both.
translation.zh: 都答对了

translation.en: I'm that guy on the TV with the drink, and yes, I'm famous.
translation.zh: 我就是电视上喝酒的那个人 没错 我很出名

translation.en: -Very, very famous. -Can I get a photo with you?
translation.zh: -非常有名 -我可以跟你合影吗？

translation.en: -Sure. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -当然 -是吗？

translation.en: You know, the guys at the garage ain't gonna believe me.
translation.zh: 车库里的人不会相信我的

translation.en: -Make it quick. -Hold on a sec. Come on.
translation.zh: -快点 -等等 来吧

translation.en: That's nice. There we go. All right.
translation.zh: 太好了 好了 好吧

translation.en: What the...
translation.zh: 什么…

translation.en: -Hi, Earl. You got a light? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -嗨 厄尔 有火吗？ -有

translation.en: Always. Here.
translation.zh: 总是有 给

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Stay down! Stay down!
translation.zh: 趴下别动！

translation.en: -Leo! Leo! -It's on fire.
translation.zh: -里奥！ -着火了

translation.en: That is massively stupid. That's an $85,000 vehicle!
translation.zh: 这太愚蠢了 那可是一辆8.5万美元的车！

translation.en: Well, he was assaulted.
translation.zh: 他被袭击了

translation.en: He tried to assault me!
translation.zh: 他想袭击我！

translation.en: Well, don't just stand there gawking. Get your phones out!
translation.zh: 别傻站着看了 把你们的手机拿出来！

translation.en: -Right, Max, all right. -Film this! Document!
translation.zh: -好吧 麦克斯 -拍下来！留作资料！

translation.en: Christ!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Cauliflower.
translation.zh: 花椰菜

translation.en: Yeah, this is Max. Get Mike on the phone.
translation.zh: 是的 我是麦克斯 让迈克接电话

translation.en: What did he just say?
translation.zh: 他刚刚说了什么？

translation.en: Wait. You can't just walk away. This is a crime scene!
translation.zh: 等等 你不能一走了之 这是犯罪现场！

translation.en: Did you just say cauliflower to me?
translation.zh: 你刚才是对我说了花椰菜吗？

translation.en: Unless I'm mistaken,
translation.zh: 除非我听错了

translation.en: yesterday, as you were leaving the bar, you said the word "cauliflower."
translation.zh: 昨天离开酒吧的时候 你说了“花椰菜”这个词

translation.en: That's right. I did.
translation.zh: 没错 我说了

translation.en: The last time you said that word to me,
translation.zh: 上次你对我说这个词的时候

translation.en: I ended up getting sent down for six months.
translation.zh: 我被关了六个月

translation.en: -It was juvie. -I was 13.
translation.zh: -那是少年罪犯 -我当时才13岁

translation.en: And you were supposed to be the lookout, now, weren't you?
translation.zh: 你应该是放哨的 对吧？

translation.en: Being that I was your kid brother,
translation.zh: 因为我是你弟弟

translation.en: I let you lead me into trouble with all your crazy cauliflower plans.
translation.zh: 我让你那些疯狂的花椰菜计划 给我带来了麻烦

translation.en: My life of crime is over.
translation.zh: 我的犯罪生涯结束了

translation.en: But you did make breakfast this morning.
translation.zh: 但你今天早上做了早餐

translation.en: Even burned the bacon like I like and you hate.
translation.zh: 还有我喜欢而你讨厌那样烤的培根

translation.en: I also saw you have some sort of robbery "To-do" list.
translation.zh: 我还看到你有一份抢劫“任务”清单

translation.en: Now, I know this attempt to be organized is a big step for you.
translation.zh: 我知道这次有组织的尝试 对你来说是一大步 所以去做吧

translation.en: So, go.
translation.zh: 对你来说是一大步 所以去做吧

translation.en: Charlotte Motor Speedway.
translation.zh: 夏洛特赛道

translation.en: The Speedway?
translation.zh: 赛道？

translation.en: It's one of the busiest sports venues in the country.
translation.zh: 那是全国最繁忙的体育场馆之一

translation.en: Just last year, they had over 300 events.
translation.zh: 就在去年 那里举办了300多场活动

translation.en: It's the official home of NASCAR, of course.
translation.zh: 当然 那是纳斯卡的官方主场

translation.en: That's all run on that main track.
translation.zh: 这些都是在主赛道上运行的

translation.en: But that place right there ain't just about racing.
translation.zh: 但那个地方不只是赛车

translation.en: This place is like a city.
translation.zh: 那个地方就像一座城市

translation.en: A few years ago, they built condos
translation.zh: 几年前 他们为那些

translation.en: for people who want to live above the track all year long.
translation.zh: 想要全年住在赛道上的人建造了公寓

translation.en: They sold out in less than 24 hours.
translation.zh: 不到24小时就卖光了

translation.en: They even got their own police force and jail
translation.zh: 那里还有自己的警察和监狱

translation.en: for people carrying on and getting out of hand.
translation.zh: 关押那些持续犯罪和失控的人

translation.en: Do you hear the words coming out your mouth?
translation.zh: 你听到从你嘴里说出来的话了吗？

translation.en: "They have their own police force."
translation.zh: “他们有自己的警察”

translation.en: I'm midway through my presentation,
translation.zh: 我的演讲进行到一半

translation.en: so, you can just not interrupt me and let me get it out.
translation.zh: 所以你可以不要打断我 让我把话说完

translation.en: How many times have I listened to that "Logan family curse" thing of yours?
translation.zh: 我听过多少次 你说的"罗根家族诅咒"了？

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Now, as you very well know,
translation.zh: 现在 你很清楚

translation.en: the Speedway has got a big problem on its hands right now.
translation.zh: 赛道现在面临着一个大问题

translation.en: A 40-year-old pipe burst,
translation.zh: 一根40年历史的管子裂了

translation.en: and since the whole thing's built on a landfill, it's turning to mush,
translation.zh: 由于整个建筑都建在垃圾填埋场上 管道正在变成一团糊状物

translation.en: -which is causing all these sinkholes. -Sinkholes.
translation.zh: -这就造成了这些污水坑 -污水坑

translation.en: That's right. The sinkholes in the infield.
translation.zh: 没错 污水坑都在内场

translation.en: They wanted to fix this thing up right, so what did they do?
translation.zh: 他们想把那东西修好 他们做了什么？

translation.en: What did they do? They called a bunch of us who used to work down in them mines.
translation.zh: 他们做了什么？他们打电话叫了许多 我们这些以前在矿井里工作的人

translation.en: 'Cause we know the work.
translation.zh: 因为我们了解这项工作

translation.en: And you do good work.
translation.zh: 你做得很好

translation.en: -We do good work. -But you were just fired.
translation.zh: -我们做得很好 -但你刚被解雇了

translation.en: I was let go for liability reasons involving insurance.
translation.zh: 我因为涉及保险的责任原因被解雇了

translation.en: Can you just get to the part of why you think you can do this?
translation.zh: 你能直接说 你为什么觉得你能做到吗？

translation.en: I know how they move the money.
translation.zh: 我知道他们是怎么运钱的

translation.en: -Who's got the code? -They can't get in!
translation.zh: -谁有密码？ -他们进不来了！

translation.en: It's Christmas, 12-25. That's the override.
translation.zh: 是圣诞节日期 1225 那个可以覆写

translation.en: Hurry.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: I got something. I got leg. I got leg!
translation.zh: 我挖到了什么 我挖到了腿！

translation.en: -Give him some air! -Easy, easy, easy.
translation.zh: -给他点空气！ -慢一点

translation.en: All right. Come on.
translation.zh: 好了 走吧

translation.en: Hey Bobo, what the hell is all this stuff?
translation.zh: 喂 波波 这些都是什么？

translation.en: Well, that's PTT.
translation.zh: 那是压管运

translation.en: What them, they gas lines?
translation.zh: 那是什么 天然气管道吗？

translation.en: Pneumatic Tube Transport.
translation.zh: 气压管运输

translation.en: Each concession has its own rig.
translation.zh: 每个油田都有自己的钻井平台

translation.en: When a register starts to fill up,
translation.zh: 当寄存器开始满的时候

translation.en: they can do a money dump through the PTT.
translation.zh: 他们可以通过压管运进行资金倾销

translation.en: Easy to do, and it don't interfere with the beer selling.
translation.zh: 这很容易做到 而且不会影响啤酒的销售

translation.en: Plus heck of a lot more secure than trying to pick up cash during a race.
translation.zh: 而且这比在比赛中捡钱安全多了

translation.en: So, all them pipes, they what, they just run right into the...
translation.zh: 所以所有的管道 这些 这些就直接通往…

translation.en: To the main vault.
translation.zh: 通往主金库

translation.en: The whole thing is like a cash highway.
translation.zh: 整个东西就像一条现金高速公路

translation.en: I even know the when to do it.
translation.zh: 我还知道什么时候进行

translation.en: June 4th, the Grocery Castle Auto Show.
translation.zh: 六月四日 杂货店城堡车展

translation.en: It's graduation weekend.
translation.zh: 那是个毕业周末

translation.en: It'll be the smallest turnout of the summer.
translation.zh: 那将是今年夏天人数最少的一次

translation.en: And gonna be bare-bones staff and security.
translation.zh: 只有最基本的工作人员和保安

translation.en: A real bank vault?
translation.zh: 一个真正的银行金库？

translation.en: Yeah, it's a tough one, too. I looked it up on the Google.
translation.zh: 是的 也是很难办的一个 我在谷歌上查了

translation.en: The only guy that knows anything about blowing up real bank vaults
translation.zh: 唯一知道怎么炸掉真正银行金库的人

translation.en: is Joe Bang.
translation.zh: 就是乔·邦

translation.en: Joe Bang, that's a legend right there. You know where he is.
translation.zh: 乔·邦 他是那里的传说 你知道他在哪儿

translation.en: No, I know where he is.
translation.zh: 不是 我知道他在哪儿

translation.en: We can't do it without him.
translation.zh: 没有他 我们做不到

translation.en: This is a surprise.
translation.zh: 真是个惊喜

translation.en: What you say there, Joe Bang?
translation.zh: 你过得好吗 乔·邦？

translation.en: Ain't seen you in a while. How goes it?
translation.zh: 好久没见到你了 情况如何？

translation.en: Well, I'm sitting on this side of the table, wearing a onesie.
translation.zh: 我坐在桌子这边 穿着连体衣

translation.en: How do you think it's going?
translation.zh: 你觉得情况如何？

translation.en: Well, you look good.
translation.zh: 你看起来不错

translation.en: Real good. Fit.
translation.zh: 真的不错 体型很好

translation.en: You two got any quarters?
translation.zh: 你们俩有硬币吗？

translation.en: I got a quarter.
translation.zh: 我有25美分

translation.en: -Does it have to be quarters? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -一定要是硬币吗？ -是的

translation.en: -Come on, now. -I found one.
translation.zh: -现在快点儿吧 -我找到了一个

translation.en: Yeah, why don't you go over to the machine on the left,
translation.zh: 好 不如你去左边的机器那里

translation.en: you punch J-7, bring it back.
translation.zh: 输入J-7 然后再拿回来

translation.en: Go on, now.
translation.zh: 现在去吧

translation.en: Doctors. They say I have high blood pressure.
translation.zh: 医生们 他们说我有高血压

translation.en: So, I get this low-sodium salt, special.
translation.zh: 所以我买了这个低钠的 特制的

translation.en: Fake salt.
translation.zh: 假盐

translation.en: Can you believe that?
translation.zh: 你们能相信吗？

translation.en: Someone thought to do that.
translation.zh: 有人想到要这么做

translation.en: They make fake salt.
translation.zh: 他们制造假盐

translation.en: So, you wanna talk business?
translation.zh: 你们想谈生意吗？

translation.en: Well, we got a job for you.
translation.zh: 我们给你找了份工作

translation.en: A vault.
translation.zh: 金库

translation.en: Look around you, my friends.
translation.zh: 看看你们周围 朋友们

translation.en: My bank-blowing days are over.
translation.zh: 我的银行危机时代结束了

translation.en: Besides...
translation.zh: 而且…

translation.en: I got a little nest egg, waiting for me when I get out.
translation.zh: 我有一笔积蓄 等着我出狱

translation.en: You're stashing $97,000?
translation.zh: 你藏了97000美元？

translation.en: Buried under the oak tree with the red swing, out at your place.
translation.zh: 埋在橡树下的红色秋千 在你家外面

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.zh: 也许

translation.en: It seems your brother, Fish, told his wife about your stash.
translation.zh: 看来是你弟弟菲什 把你藏钱的事告诉了他妻子

translation.en: Fish told Misty?
translation.zh: 菲什告诉了米斯蒂？

translation.en: Yep. Next day, Misty dug the whole thing up,
translation.zh: 是的 第二天 米斯蒂就把那东西都挖了出来

translation.en: and ran off with some truck driver from Florida.
translation.zh: 和一个佛罗里达的卡车司机私奔了

translation.en: What part of Florida?
translation.zh: 佛罗里达的哪个地方？

translation.en: Clearwater.
translation.zh: 克利尔沃特

translation.en: It's a Carven Hill vault,
translation.zh: 这是卡文山的金库

translation.en: just like the one you blew up in Parkersburg.
translation.zh: 就像你在帕克斯堡炸的那个一样

translation.en: Steel-encased concrete?
translation.zh: 混凝土包钢结构？

translation.en: Yeah. Wall is 20-inch thick.
translation.zh: 是的 墙体有六米厚

translation.en: Alarms?
translation.zh: 警报呢？

translation.en: You sneeze within 10 feet of a Carven Hill vault,
translation.zh: 你在卡文山金库的三米内打喷嚏

translation.en: its seismic sensors will have you wearing one of these onesies
translation.zh: 震波传感器会让你们 在知道发生了什么之前

translation.en: before you knew what happened.
translation.zh: 穿上这种连体衣

translation.en: There's construction going on around there right now,
translation.zh: 那里现在正在施工

translation.en: so them seismic sensors are turned off.
translation.zh: 所以他们关掉了震波传感器

translation.en: So, we just need you to blow her open.
translation.zh: 所以我们只需要你把金库炸开

translation.en: Yeah, I got five months to go in here.
translation.zh: 是啊 我在这里还有五个月的时间

translation.en: I should probably lay low a bit before doing a job.
translation.zh: 我应该在工作前低调一点

translation.en: This has to happen in five weeks.
translation.zh: 必须在五周内完成

translation.en: I am incarcerated.
translation.zh: 我被监禁了

translation.en: Yeah, we got a plan to get you out.
translation.zh: 是的 我们有个救你出来的计划

translation.en: As in, break me out?
translation.zh: 就是帮我越狱？

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: In the middle of the night?
translation.zh: 在半夜？

translation.en: No. Afternoon. It's a day job.
translation.zh: 不是 在下午 日间工作的时候

translation.en: You're gonna get me out of here in broad daylight,
translation.zh: 你们要在光天化日之下把我弄出去

translation.en: do the job,
translation.zh: 完成工作

translation.en: and then get me back in here before anyone notices?
translation.zh: 然后在别人发现之前把我弄回来？

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: You Logans must be as simple-minded as people say.
translation.zh: 你们罗根一家 一定像人们说的那样头脑简单

translation.en: -People say that? -People say that?
translation.zh: 人们是这么说的？

translation.en: Who?
translation.zh: 谁？

translation.en: So.
translation.zh: 所以

translation.en: What's the take?
translation.zh: 能收多少钱？

translation.en: It's bigger than you can bury under an oak tree.
translation.zh: 比你埋在橡树下的要多

translation.en: -And the split? -Even split.
translation.zh: -那分完之后呢？ -连在分完之后也是

translation.en: No. No way.
translation.zh: 不会的 不可能

translation.en: Well, why not?
translation.zh: 为什么不可能？

translation.en: I got a brother. I got two.
translation.zh: 我有个弟弟 我有两个人

translation.en: I'd need them involved to protect my interest.
translation.zh: 我需要他们的参与来保护我的利益

translation.en: Sadie, why don't you take these over to your momma,
translation.zh: 莎蒂 不如你把这些拿给你妈妈

translation.en: and I'll bring the rest?
translation.zh: 然后我来拿剩下的？

translation.en: When are you gonna give that piece of junk up?
translation.zh: 你什么时候能放弃那件破烂？

translation.en: I keep telling you to come on down to the dealership,
translation.zh: 我一直跟你说去找那家经销商

translation.en: and I'll hook you up. You know we're family.
translation.zh: 我来帮你牵头 你知道我们是一家人

translation.en: We're not family.
translation.zh: 我们不是一家人

translation.en: You mean, I can't interest you in the latest V-6 offering
translation.zh: 你是说 我这美国经典野马的最新

translation.en: of the American classic Mustang?
translation.zh: V6系列跑车都不能引起你的兴趣

translation.en: 3.7 liters of pure power.
translation.zh: 3.7升的澎湃动力

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: You can't tell me you wouldn't love to get behind the wheel of this baby.
translation.zh: 你不会告诉我 你喜欢坐在那个小屁孩的副驾吧

translation.en: Come on, jump on in. Take it for a spin.
translation.zh: 来吧 上车吧 来试试

translation.en: I don't need anything that fancy.
translation.zh: 我不需要那么花哨的东西

translation.en: Well, you know, this Nova ended up costing Chevy a ton,
translation.zh: 你要知道 这辆科迈罗可让雪佛兰花了不少钱

translation.en: 'cause it totally bit the dust in Mexico.
translation.zh: 因为它在墨西哥完全一败涂地

translation.en: You know, in Mexican, Nova translates to "No Go."
translation.zh: 你知道 在墨西哥科迈罗的意思是 “行不通”

translation.en: They couldn't get anyone to buy it.
translation.zh: 它们吸引不了任何人来买

translation.en: 'Cause they all thought the car would, you know, "No Go."
translation.zh: 因为大家都认为这辆车“行不通”

translation.en: -You're an idiot. -No, it's true.
translation.zh: -你是个白痴 -不是 那是真的

translation.en: -Not true. -Look it up.
translation.zh: -不是真的 -你查一下

translation.en: I am kind of surprised you went for the V-6 automatic.
translation.zh: 我很惊讶你选择了V6自动挡

translation.en: The V-8's just so much faster,
translation.zh: V8明明要快得多

translation.en: and you can really feel the road under you.
translation.zh: 你能清晰地感觉到车轮下的路面

translation.en: 'Course, I keep forgetting you can't drive stick.
translation.zh: 当然了 我老忘了你不会开手动挡

translation.en: No, I know how to drive stick.
translation.zh: 不是 我会开手动挡

translation.en: I don't think you do.
translation.zh: 我不这么觉得

translation.en: All the cars you always bringing home from the lot are auto.
translation.zh: 每次你从车库开回家的 都是自动挡的车

translation.en: I love stick. I'm a big fan of stick!
translation.zh: 我超爱手动挡 我是手动挡的铁粉！

translation.en: -Sadie! Come on! Come on! -Yeah! Go!
translation.zh: -莎蒂！加油！ -真棒！冲！

translation.en: Come on, come on, come on!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: -Come on, girl, let's go! -Go, Sadie!
translation.zh: -加油 姑娘 加油！ -冲 莎蒂！

translation.en: You got a ribbon, baby. Come here. What's it say?
translation.zh: 你赢了一枚勋章 宝贝 快过来 上面写的什么？

translation.en: It's not first place. It only matters if you win.
translation.zh: 这又不是第一名 只有赢了才有意义

translation.en: What? That ain't true at all.
translation.zh: 什么？那可不对

translation.en: That boy's damn near 14-years-old.
translation.zh: 那个男孩都快14岁了

translation.en: Come on. Give me a smile.
translation.zh: 来吧 笑一笑

translation.en: Go show your momma.
translation.zh: 去给你妈妈看看

translation.en: -Way to go, baby doll. -Congratulations.
translation.zh: -好样的 小洋娃娃 -恭喜

translation.en: -Come to Momma. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -来妈妈这里 -谢谢

translation.en: Hey, you did good.
translation.zh: 喂 你做得很好

translation.en: Let me see.
translation.zh: 让我看看

translation.en: Well, I found 'em.
translation.zh: 我找到他们了

translation.en: Where?
translation.zh: 在哪儿？

translation.en: You should see.
translation.zh: 你应该看看的

translation.en: They'll know what we want them to know.
translation.zh: 他们只会知道 我们想告诉他们的

translation.en: Let's hear it for the Bang brothers, folks!
translation.zh: 让我们祝贺邦兄弟俩 各位！

translation.en: Y'all got a sec?
translation.zh: 你们有空吗？

translation.en: I'm winning, okay? Not stopping.
translation.zh: 我们还要赢 好吗？不想停下来

translation.en: Don't you put the Logan hex on me.
translation.zh: 别把罗根诅咒传染给我们

translation.en: Yeah, we been out to see your brother.
translation.zh: 对 我们去见你们哥哥了

translation.en: He tell you we were looking to talk to y'all?
translation.zh: 他告诉过你们 我们想和你们谈一谈了吗？

translation.en: Joe said you need for him to blow open the vault.
translation.zh: 乔说你们需要他来打开金库大门

translation.en: Something like that.
translation.zh: 差不多吧

translation.en: Joe said you know computers.
translation.zh: 乔说你懂电脑

translation.en: Yeah, I went to technical college.
translation.zh: 对 我上过技校

translation.en: Well, this here's a little more involved than that.
translation.zh: 这件事比那个要更复杂一些

translation.en: We need, like, a computer whiz.
translation.zh: 我们需要一个电脑专家

translation.en: Like, one of them Facebook boys.
translation.zh: 像是 脸书工作的那种年轻人

translation.en: I know everything there is to know about computers.
translation.zh: 我了解关于电脑的所有事儿

translation.en: -Okay? -Do you?
translation.zh: -好吗？ -你行吗？

translation.en: All the Twitters, I know 'em.
translation.zh: 还有推特什么的 我都懂

translation.en: But me and Sam just ain't sure we can help y'all.
translation.zh: 但我和萨姆不确定我们能帮到你们

translation.en: -You can't help us? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你帮不了我们？ -对

translation.en: We're living with the Lord now.
translation.zh: 我们现在开始信上帝了

translation.en: Which means on the light side of the raw.
translation.zh: 也就是说我们现在走正路了

translation.en: If you two ain't into this,
translation.zh: 如果你们俩不入伙

translation.en: then why the hell did Joe tell us to come out here, then?
translation.zh: 那到底为什么乔要让我过来？

translation.en: Gotta have a good reason to break the law. Do something like robbing.
translation.zh: 需要有一个好点的违法理由 去抢劫什么的

translation.en: Yeah, we need a moral reason.
translation.zh: 对 我们需要一个道德上的理由

translation.en: We'd be robbing the Grocery Castle Auto.
translation.zh: 我们要去抢劫杂货店城堡车展

translation.en: You can't tell me you ain't shoplifted from the Grocery Castle.
translation.zh: 你们不能告诉我 你们没在杂货城堡偷过东西吧

translation.en: Yeah, we used to shoplift from them all the time,
translation.zh: 是 我们以前一直从他们那儿偷东西

translation.en: but that was before.
translation.zh: 但那是以前了

translation.en: Well, our sister, Mellie,
translation.zh: 我们的妹妹 梅莉

translation.en: she used to work up at the Grocery Castle outside Manila.
translation.zh: 以前在马尼拉城外的杂货城堡打工

translation.en: And they promoted her to checker after a month.
translation.zh: 一个月后他们就提她做了主管

translation.en: Then the assistant manager started getting handsy.
translation.zh: 然后助理经理就开始对她动手动脚

translation.en: -Handsy. -So, you can imagine.
translation.zh: -动手动脚 -所以 你们可以想象

translation.en: Our family don't have no love for the Grocery Castle.
translation.zh: 我们家有多不喜欢杂货城堡

translation.en: I can understand the feels.
translation.zh: 我能理解你们的感受

translation.en: Yeah, this being their big event and all, the auto show,
translation.zh: 是啊 这是他们的一次大活动 这次车展

translation.en: -we don't feel too bad about it. -Nope.
translation.zh: -我们并不会感觉抢劫不好 -不会

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: -What you think? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你觉得呢？ -可以

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Sounds good enough for us.
translation.zh: 对我俩来说听起来不错

translation.en: 'Cause of the whole morality thing.
translation.zh: 因为有充分的道德上的动机了

translation.en: I need you two to go visit the bear in the woods.
translation.zh: 我要你们两个去见树林里的那头熊

translation.en: Tell him you're there to collect the bag he's been keeping for me.
translation.zh: 告诉他 你们是来 取走我寄存在他那儿的包

translation.en: Cauliflower.
translation.zh: 花椰菜

translation.en: Vehicular mischief.
translation.zh: 驾车肇事

translation.en: Reckless endangerment, destruction of private property.
translation.zh: 危险行为、危害他人财产

translation.en: I'd take your license away, Clyde,
translation.zh: 我要撤消你的驾照 克莱德

translation.en: but it was suspended two years ago.
translation.zh: 但是你的驾照两年前就停用了

translation.en: And despite your claim that this was an accident,
translation.zh: 虽然你声称这是意外

translation.en: that your foot slipped, these are serious charges.
translation.zh: 是你的脚滑了 但这些是很严重的指控

translation.en: Your previous run-ins with the law
translation.zh: 你之前的违法记录

translation.en: were back when you were classified as a juvenile,
translation.zh: 可以追溯到你未成年的时候

translation.en: and of course, in determining your sentencing...
translation.zh: 当然 在量刑时

translation.en: I'm taking into account your service,
translation.zh: 我会考虑你的服役记录

translation.en: and the great sacrifice you've made for our country.
translation.zh: 还有你为我们国家做出的巨大牺牲

translation.en: I sentence you to 90 days.
translation.zh: 我宣判你被处以90天有期徒刑

translation.en: You sure these measurements is right?
translation.zh: 你确定这些尺寸是对的吗？

translation.en: Mellie gave 'em to me. And Mellie knows her trucks.
translation.zh: 梅莉把这些给我了 梅莉了解她的卡车

translation.en: Sadie's to-do list. Make sure you get it all done.
translation.zh: 莎蒂的任务清单 要确保你都做完了

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: -Come on. -Careful!
translation.zh: -来吧 -小心！

translation.en: "Tanning salon"?
translation.zh: “美黑沙龙”？

translation.en: Yeah, well, we'll see about that.
translation.zh: 好 我们会看看的

translation.en: Now, it has to be dependable.
translation.zh: 现在 这必须要可靠

translation.en: I can't have no chance of it breaking down.
translation.zh: 我不能承担坏在半路的风险

translation.en: You want a camper covering the bed of the truck? Or just empty?
translation.zh: 你想要有盖住床棚顶的露营车？ 还是敞篷的？

translation.en: Yeah, a cover's a good idea, 'cause them campers can get kinda creepy.
translation.zh: 有棚顶的比较好 因为他们露营的总是有点恐怖

translation.en: I think them cops more likely to give them camper trucks a second look.
translation.zh: 我觉得他们警察会多看露营车两眼

translation.en: All right, Sadie-bug, get them goggles down.
translation.zh: 好吧 小莎蒂 把眼镜戴好

translation.en: I don't wanna get none of this in your peepers.
translation.zh: 我可不能把这个弄到你眼睛里

translation.en: You sure about this?
translation.zh: 你确定吗？

translation.en: I'm ready.
translation.zh: 我准备好了

translation.en: All right. Close your eyes.
translation.zh: 好吧 闭上眼睛

translation.en: You littered all over my car with your shoes.
translation.zh: 你踢来踢去把我的车都弄脏了

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 好吧 我很抱歉

translation.en: Wait, get your hand off.
translation.zh: 等等 把手放开

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: -You excited? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你兴奋吗？ -兴奋

translation.en: Extensions!
translation.zh: 接发！

translation.en: -I got real long this time. -Yeah!
translation.zh: -我这次弄得很长 -太好了！

translation.en: I thought you were going as Rihanna.
translation.zh: 我以为你要假扮蕾哈娜

translation.en: Daddy, it's not Halloween. I'm not going as Rihanna.
translation.zh: 爸爸 今天不是万圣节 我不会假扮蕾哈娜的

translation.en: I'm singing a song of hers for my talent.
translation.zh: 我要唱一首她的歌作为才艺展示

translation.en: I still got two other categories to compete in, Denim Wear and Glitz.
translation.zh: 我还有两种造型可以选 牛仔服和奢华版

translation.en: For Glitz, I need this hair.
translation.zh: 我的奢华造型 就需要这些头发

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: That looks like it hurt.
translation.zh: 看起来很痛

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: It did.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: It's healing up now pretty good, though.
translation.zh: 但现在恢复得很好

translation.en: Looks like you could've used a couple of stitches.
translation.zh: 看来你可以来缝几针的

translation.en: A little late for that, I guess.
translation.zh: 我想 现在有点晚了

translation.en: Well, when was the last time you had a tetanus shot?
translation.zh: 你上次打破伤风针是什么时候？

translation.en: Never?
translation.zh: 从来没有？

translation.en: That the wrong answer?
translation.zh: 这是错误答案吗？

translation.en: There are no wrong answers
translation.zh: 你跟医护人员说话时

translation.en: when you're talkin' to a healthcare professional.
translation.zh: 没有什么错误答案

translation.en: Would you like one?
translation.zh: 你想打一针吗？

translation.en: What is all this, like a charity or something?
translation.zh: 这是什么 慈善机构之类的吗？

translation.en: Jimmy Logan, you know as well as I do,
translation.zh: 吉米·罗根 你跟我一样清楚

translation.en: folks around here don't like the word charity.
translation.zh: 这里的人都不喜欢慈善这个词

translation.en: We West Virginians are a proud folk.
translation.zh: 西佛吉尼亚人是一群很骄傲的家伙

translation.en: We have a couple of grants,
translation.zh: 我们有几笔拨款

translation.en: but mostly get by on private donations.
translation.zh: 但大部分都是私人捐款

translation.en: People are happy we do our work.
translation.zh: 人们很高兴我们做我们的工作

translation.en: Driving from town to town,
translation.zh: 从一个小镇开车到另一个

translation.en: trying to help locals who can't make it to the doctor.
translation.zh: 试图帮助那些不能去看医生的当地人

translation.en: What happened to 3-2-1?
translation.zh: 你怎么没有倒数三、二、一？

translation.en: So you know me? We met before?
translation.zh: 所以你认识我？我们之前见过？

translation.en: I went to Valley View. A couple years behind you.
translation.zh: 我去过谷景县 比你晚几年

translation.en: Back then, you were all Jimmy Logan, quarterback, Homecoming King.
translation.zh: 那时候你还是那个明星吉米·罗根 四分卫 返校节的国王

translation.en: Only had eyes for Bobbie Jo Campbell, if I recall.
translation.zh: 如果我没记错 你当时眼里只有鲍比·乔·坎贝尔

translation.en: Hold that there.
translation.zh: 按住这里

translation.en: I think you'll like this one.
translation.zh: 我想你会喜欢这个的

translation.en: There we go. I got that.
translation.zh: 好了 我弄完了

translation.en: So, Sylvia?
translation.zh: 你是西尔维娅？

translation.en: Ain't no one ever called you Sylvie?
translation.zh: 没人叫你西尔维吗？

translation.en: No one has ever called me Sylvie.
translation.zh: 从来没有人叫我西尔维

translation.en: That's weird.
translation.zh: 真奇怪

translation.en: My name?
translation.zh: 我的名字吗？

translation.en: Well, you know, it's just...
translation.zh: 就是有点…

translation.en: It's kind of like an old-lady name.
translation.zh: 有点像老奶奶的名字

translation.en: To me.
translation.zh: 对我来说

translation.en: It just don't seem like it should be on a person like you.
translation.zh: 不太像是你这样的人的名字

translation.en: That looks like you. That's, you know...
translation.zh: 像你这样的人 就是…

translation.en: My grand-momma. Her name was Sylvia.
translation.zh: 我奶奶 她的名字就是西尔维娅

translation.en: So, that's just what I think of when I think of that name.
translation.zh: 所以这就是我见到这个名字 就会想到老人

translation.en: I thought you was getting coffee.
translation.zh: 我以为你去买咖啡了

translation.en: Didn't know we was seeing patients yet.
translation.zh: 我不知道我们这儿来病人了

translation.en: I got a coffee and a patient.
translation.zh: 我又买了有咖啡 又收了位病人

translation.en: But we better hit the road.
translation.zh: 但我们最好上路吧

translation.en: Sounds like that alternator needs a tetanus shot.
translation.zh: 听起来交流发电机需要打一针破伤风

translation.en: Alternators cost money.
translation.zh: 交流发电机要花钱

translation.en: Tetanus shots are free.
translation.zh: 破伤风针却是免费的

translation.en: There's a garage over off Bluefield Canyon Road.
translation.zh: 在蓝田峡谷那边有一个车库

translation.en: Ask for Earl. Might not be free, but he'll treat you fine.
translation.zh: 问问厄尔 可能不会免费 但他会好好招待你的

translation.en: -Thanks. -All right.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -没事

translation.en: Hey, hold on a second. Hold on. Hold on.
translation.zh: 喂 等一下 等等 等等

translation.en: Did we kiss?
translation.zh: 我们接吻了吗？

translation.en: I mean, in high school, we kissed, didn't we?
translation.zh: 我是说 在高中 我们接过吻 对吧？

translation.en: That has got to be the worst thing anyone has ever said to me.
translation.zh: 这肯定是别人对我说过最糟糕的话

translation.en: Hold on, hold on, wait, wait. I'm saying I remember is all.
translation.zh: 等等 我只是说我记得

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: I do remember.
translation.zh: 我真的记得

translation.en: I see there's still a lot of your rules up there.
translation.zh: 我看到你们还有很多规则

translation.en: So?
translation.zh: 所以呢？

translation.en: Just...
translation.zh: 就…

translation.en: Have you thought about having a backup plan, or...
translation.zh: 你有没有想过弄一个备用方案？ 或者…

translation.en: What we're gonna do the first time "shit happens,"
translation.zh: 如果第一次发生了 意料之外的“倒霉事”

translation.en: let alone the second time?
translation.zh: 更别说第二次了？

translation.en: Why don't you just worry about your cockroaches?
translation.zh: 你为什么不操心你自己的蟑螂呢？

translation.en: And I'll worry about the rules.
translation.zh: 我来考虑这些规则

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 行

translation.en: -Jimmy? -Hey, what you say, Cal?
translation.zh: -吉米？ -喂 怎么了 卡尔？

translation.en: Hey, how you been?
translation.zh: 嗨 你好吗？

translation.en: What's going on, man? You know, staying busy.
translation.zh: 你还好吗 老兄？我一直在忙着

translation.en: -Good, good, good. Did you find work? -Yeah, a few things.
translation.zh: -很好 你找到工作了吗？ -是的 有些活儿干

translation.en: Great. These parts, or back in Boone County?
translation.zh: 挺好 在这一片 还是布恩县那边？

translation.en: -No, back home. -Good, good, good.
translation.zh: -不是 在家那边 -很好

translation.en: Well, I'm glad to hear that.
translation.zh: 我很高兴听你这么说

translation.en: I felt bad and all about having to let you go.
translation.zh: 我必须要开除你让我很过意不去

translation.en: Come on. Don't even worry about it.
translation.zh: 没事的 别担心这个了

translation.en: -I know it was them, not you. -Even if things had been different,
translation.zh: -我知道是他们干的 不怪你 -就算事情不一样了

translation.en: I'd probably have to let you go anyway, since we're wrapping it up.
translation.zh: 我可能还是必须要让你走 因为我们要结束了

translation.en: What? You're all wrapping up the site? You all done?
translation.zh: 什么？你们现场都停工了？ 你们都做完了？

translation.en: Yeah, just about. Yeah.
translation.zh: 是 差不多了 对

translation.en: Managed to be ahead of schedule for once.
translation.zh: 成功地提前完成了

translation.en: You patched up all them sinkholes?
translation.zh: 你们补上了所有缺口吗？

translation.en: Yeah, almost. We're gonna pull the gear first of the month.
translation.zh: 对 差不多吧 我们在本月初开始动工了

translation.en: You know that thing we been talking about?
translation.zh: 你记得我们之前谈的那件事吗？

translation.en: We got to move it up a week.
translation.zh: 我们要提前一周了

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 发生什么了？

translation.en: Opportunity is gonna be closing up.
translation.zh: 机会马上就要错过了

translation.en: So, everything stays the same,
translation.zh: 所以 为了还能正常进行

translation.en: we just gotta move everything up by one week.
translation.zh: 我们必须把所有事情都提前一周

translation.en: Wait, one week earlier? But that's...
translation.zh: 等等 提前一周？但那…

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: I guess this is "shit happens."
translation.zh: 我猜这就是意料之外的“倒霉事”

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: So, should we cancel?
translation.zh: 所以我们要取消吗？

translation.en: No difference.
translation.zh: 没什么区别

translation.en: The Coca-Cola 600 is the biggest race of the year.
translation.zh: 可口可乐600是今年最大的赛事

translation.en: That's a big difference.
translation.zh: 那会有很大区别

translation.en: That don't change the job at all.
translation.zh: 完全不会改变我们的任务的

translation.en: So, should I call The Baker?
translation.zh: 所以 我该打电话给烘焙师吗？

translation.en: Call The Baker.
translation.zh: 打给烘焙师

translation.en: This is Gleema.
translation.zh: 我是格里玛

translation.en: -Gleema Purdue? -Yes.
translation.zh: -格里玛·普渡？ -是的

translation.en: Need you to sign right here, please.
translation.zh: 请你在这里签名

translation.en: Right there, please.
translation.zh: 就在这儿 谢谢

translation.en: Who's it from?
translation.zh: 谁送来的？

translation.en: I mean, I have no idea.

translation.en: Well...

translation.en: My car.

translation.en: Oh, man!

translation.en: but I really need you to start filling this out.

translation.en: Is it 5:30?

translation.en: Howdy goody.

translation.en: Hey, y'all.

translation.en: I'm just gonna squeeze myself in there.

translation.en: So, Naaman.

translation.en: -One. One. -One. One.
translation.zh: -一 -一

translation.en: -Three. -Three.
translation.zh: -三 -三

translation.en: -Eight. -Eight.

translation.en: Shit, man, what's up?

translation.en: Hey, Jimmy.

translation.en: No names.

translation.en: A what?

translation.en: A secure location.

translation.en: I'm at the Lowe's.

translation.en: I'm calling on a phone. Like, a real phone.

translation.en: Go ahead.

translation.en: -Fish! Sam! -It's Jimmy.

translation.en: Hold on!
translation.zh: 等等！

translation.en: -Get up, goddamn it! -Hold on!

translation.en: Goddamn it.

translation.en: Hey. You didn't have to scare us like that.

translation.en: We thought you was the law.

translation.en: When did you have a chance to think that?

translation.en: Seeing as you were dead asleep a second ago!

translation.en: You're supposed to meet me down at the corner.

translation.en: -Now we're running way behind! -We got it.

translation.en: You got it? You still seem half-asleep.

translation.en: We're on it, okay?

translation.en: We know where to be and when. Watch the race.

translation.en: -Don't be late. -Yes, sweetie.

translation.en: Hey, I'd like to point out that today, I am driving the V-8 stick.

translation.en: It's a nice car.

translation.en: Hopefully, you'll have beginner's luck getting it into first.

translation.en: Even in first gear,

translation.en: this thing will still blow away that "No Go" of yours.

translation.en: Not with you behind the wheel.

translation.en: Good. 'Cause we don't have a food problem here at Monroe, do we?

translation.en: You okay, Joe Bang? You're choking.

translation.en: Sounds like a wet cough, like phlegm.

translation.en: I don't feel too good.

translation.en: Shit! Get this damn convict away from me!

translation.en: -Let's go. Come on. -Get him to the infirmary!
translation.zh: -走吧 快点 -带他去医务室！

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -Christ!

translation.en: -Goddammit! -Guard, get some towels.

translation.en: Where are you going?

translation.en: I thought you'd be with me the whole time.

translation.en: I just need to go to the salon and tend to a few clients.

translation.en: I'll be back just in time to comb you out and spray you extra good.

translation.en: -Promise? -I promise.
translation.zh: -你保证？ -我保证

translation.en: This will help rehydrate you, ease the nausea.

translation.en: A lot of you guys been coming in here like that.

translation.en: It's that business with the water.

translation.en: Say you can't drink it, but it's okay to shower in it.

translation.en: I don't know about all that.

translation.en: More barf than we saw after that one Thanksgiving

translation.en: when everything had gone bad.

translation.en: It'll put a girl off of turkey forever.

translation.en: Nurse?

translation.en: Yeah?

translation.en: I think it's best if you stay put.

translation.en: Please? Miss Nurse? I'll walk slow.

translation.en: Nurse? I can take him.

translation.en: I'm finished mopping the floors in here.

translation.en: Okay. But take it slow.

translation.en: He falls and hits his head, that's on you.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna need a hand in here.

translation.en: What the fuck?

translation.en: This is not a test.

translation.en: All guards,

translation.en: and staff are to go into an immediate code-14 lockdown.

translation.en: What are you doing?

translation.en: Calling it in.

translation.en: Put that down.

translation.en: We got no plastic working at all.

translation.en: Well, hello.

translation.en: I guess someone grew up.

translation.en: -Mellie. -Mellie!

translation.en: Mellie, Mellie, Mellie.

translation.en: That rhymes with "smelly."

translation.en: Nice.

translation.en: Shut up.

translation.en: There's clothes for you both in the bag,

translation.en: and, Clyde, I put something special in there for you.

translation.en: Thanks, Mel.

translation.en: You're going pretty fast.

translation.en: Well, we got a lot of road to cover, so, yeah, there will be speeding.

translation.en: Gunning for 100 in a neon blue car

translation.en: that probably ain't even on the market yet.

translation.en: Don't you think you're asking for to be pulled over?

translation.en: Sunday on a holiday weekend.

translation.en: Police department hit by budget cuts.
translation.zh: 警方因为预算减少有不小的削弱

translation.en: There's only one musker patrolling the whole highway for the next 40 miles.

translation.en: But that's still one musker.

translation.en: It's been handled.
translation.zh: 没什么事的

translation.en: Mellie.
translation.zh: 梅莉

translation.en: I'm about to get naked back here. So, no peeking.

translation.en: I said no peeking!

translation.en: Would you give me my arm, please?

translation.en: Is it this one?

translation.en: Yes, sir. Yes, sir, I'm 100% sure.
translation.zh: 是的 先生 我百分百确定

translation.en: I saw what I saw. It's a purple '77 Eldorado. Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 我看到了 是辆紫色的 77年埃尔多拉多 是的 先生

translation.en: License and registration, ma'am.
translation.zh: 驾照和行车许可 女士

translation.en: Excuse me, but I'm on my way to church.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我赶着去教堂

translation.en: I don't have time for this.
translation.zh: 没时间应付这个

translation.en: Step out of the vehicle, ma'am. I am not going to ask you again.

translation.en: This is ridiculous! What did I do?
translation.zh: 这太荒唐了！我做了什么？

translation.en: I need you to comply, ma'am.
translation.zh: 我需要你的配合 女士

translation.en: I need your license, your registration...
translation.zh: 请出示你的驾照、你的行车许可…

translation.en: You seen that?
translation.zh: 你看到了吗？

translation.en: Seen what? I need you to focus here.
translation.zh: 看到什么？我需要你专心一点

translation.en: This woman needs containing.
translation.zh: 这个女人需要控制

translation.en: It's a beautiful day for racing in the Queen City.
translation.zh: 今天是皇后城赛车的好日子

translation.en: Welcome to the Coca-Cola 600.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到可口可乐600赛事

translation.en: This is NASCAR's greatest distance, and stock car racing's longest night.
translation.zh: 这是纳斯卡举办过的最长距离比赛 会是无规则赛车的不眠之夜

translation.en: It'll take 400 laps to complete 600 miles.
translation.zh: 选手需要驾驶400圈跑完965千米

translation.en: And Mike, one of the stories we'll be watching is this guy, Dayton White,
translation.zh: 迈克 今天我们要关注的故事之一 就是这个人 丹顿·怀特

translation.en: as he returns to racing after a two-year break.
translation.zh: 他在两年后又一次参加比赛

translation.en: Jeff, you know what it's like to get back behind the wheel...
translation.zh: 杰夫 你一定很了解这种重返赛场的感觉

translation.en: ...after some time off.
translation.zh: …在退役一段时间后

translation.en: Can we really expect this guy to run up front?
translation.zh: 我们能期待这个人位居前列吗？

translation.en: Well, that truly is the question, DW.
translation.zh: 这确实是个未知数 DW

translation.en: And, yeah, it is extremely tough.
translation.zh: 是的 这可能困难重重

translation.en: So much has changed since the last time he was in the car.
translation.zh: 因为在这两年里发生了太多的改变

translation.en: The cars have changed.
translation.zh: 赛车变了

translation.en: The setups have changed, the competition's changed.
translation.zh: 规则变了 比赛也变了

translation.en: And you just can't underestimate the mental focus and endurance needed
translation.zh: 而且在如此长一段时间的休息后 重新坐在方向盘后

translation.en: to get back behind the wheel after this long a break.
translation.zh: 所要承受的压力和专注 绝对不能被低估

translation.en: Well, focus, endurance and discipline
translation.zh: 是的 专注、忍耐还有自律

translation.en: could well describe Dayton's off-track routine.
translation.zh: 可以很好地描述丹顿的赛道外的轨迹

translation.en: We caught up with him as he prepared
translation.zh: 我们在他为这场

translation.en: for this highly anticipated return to racing.
translation.zh: 备受期待的比赛准备时找到了他

translation.en: There's a team of people looking after my car.
translation.zh: 有一组成员会照顾我的车

translation.en: Making sure everything is operating at full capacity.
translation.zh: 确保一切都在满负荷运作

translation.en: So, it makes sense that I do that for my physical self.
translation.zh: 所以 我也会照顾好我的身体

translation.en: Because I'm not just a driver, I'm an athlete.
translation.zh: 因为我不只是一名车手 我是运动员

translation.en: Once I began sourcing really clean software,
translation.zh: 一旦我开始为自己准备很好的软件

translation.en: I noticed a total difference in my clarity and performance.
translation.zh: 我注意到我的外在表现会完全不一样

translation.en: Software's what I call my food.
translation.zh: 我说的软件是指食物

translation.en: Because when you think about it, your body is your operating system.
translation.zh: 因为当你思考的时候 你的身体就是操作系统

translation.en: So, when your OS may feel like it's working fine,
translation.zh: 所以当你的操作系统运行很好的时候

translation.en: a problem with your software can make your computer not perform properly.
translation.zh: 你的软件可能会影响其正常运转

translation.en: Even crash.
translation.zh: 还可能导致崩溃

translation.en: So, eating only clean software
translation.zh: 所以 只选择干净的软件

translation.en: makes sure my OS is working at an optimum level,
translation.zh: 可以保证我的操作系统处在最佳状态

translation.en: and all this will help me win.
translation.zh: 这些都能帮助我获胜

translation.en: Speed up the drops. We'll figure the numbers out later.
translation.zh: 加快速度 我们之后再点钱

translation.en: No energy drink on the market comes in a magnum, right?
translation.zh: 市场上没有 马格南牌的量饮料 对吧？

translation.en: But I had 10 cases of these babies made just for today.
translation.zh: 但我拿到了十箱 就为今天

translation.en: I'm gonna have a little now, before the race, some during the race,
translation.zh: 我要在比赛前喝一点 比赛时再喝一点

translation.en: and come lap 600 and that checkered flag,
translation.zh: 跑完600圈然后顺利地冲向终点

translation.en: I think we're all gonna be finishing these puppies off in victory.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们会在享受胜利时 把这些喝完的

translation.en: You got us all in the shot? Me and the car?
translation.zh: 你拍到我们了吗？我和我的车？

translation.en: So, I've got this racing suit and I've got my helmet right here.
translation.zh: 这是我的赛车服 还有我的头盔

translation.en: Just want to make sure you can see that.
translation.zh: 我只是想确认你能看到

translation.en: I've been carefully monitoring my glucose levels.
translation.zh: 我一直在小心观察我的血糖水平

translation.en: So, I'm really in a sweet spot right now for sustained energy.
translation.zh: 所以 我现在正处于最佳状态 就不需要了

translation.en: You're the "To The Max" driver. You got to drink.
translation.zh: 你是“竭尽全力”的运动员 你需要喝点

translation.en: Maybe you should think about those four years of back taxes
translation.zh: 也许你应该想想这饮料四年里

translation.en: that this drink is paying for.
translation.zh: 替你付了多少欠税

translation.en: Yeah, go on!
translation.zh: 好 来吧！

translation.en: -Go on! -Come on.
translation.zh: -来吧！ -来吧

translation.en: -Let's... -Drink.

translation.zh: 我开始眼花了

translation.en: You're drifting up.
translation.zh: 你在走神

translation.en: My OS... I think it's crashing.
translation.zh: 我的系统…我觉得要崩溃了

translation.en: You're gonna bang in!
translation.zh: 你要撞上了！

translation.en: What have you got?
translation.zh: 你发现了什么？

translation.en: I got nothing.
translation.zh: 什么都没有

translation.en: -Let's try B level. -All right.
translation.zh: -我们去看看B层吧 -好

translation.en: Hold up. Stop! Where are you going?
translation.zh: 等等 停下！你们要去哪里？

translation.en: Garbage run.
translation.zh: 垃圾箱

translation.en: You two smell any smoke from down there?
translation.zh: 你们两个闻到下面有烟味了吗？

translation.en: No, 'cause we both...
translation.zh: 没有 因为我们俩都…

translation.en: We both lost our sense of smells when we was little.
translation.zh: 我们小时候都失去了嗅觉

translation.en: Because of the...
translation.zh: 因为有一次…

translation.en: -The scarlet fever. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -得了猩红热 -对

translation.en: Both of us could be on fire and not even know it.
translation.zh: 我们两个可能连起火了都不知道

translation.en: -Get that thing out of here. -Okay, thank you very much.
translation.zh: -把那堆东西搬走吧 -好的 谢谢你

translation.en: Okay. All right.
translation.zh: 好了 好吧

translation.en: Something ain't right.
translation.zh: 有点不对劲

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: Hey! Your brothers should be back by now!
translation.zh: 喂！你的兄弟们现在应该回来了！

translation.en: Why don't you go check on 'em?
translation.zh: 你为什么不去看看？

translation.en: You know there's no smoking on CMS property.
translation.zh: 你知道在建筑内是不能吸烟的吗？

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: That's probably why they put an ashtray in here.
translation.zh: 所以你猜他们为什么在这里放烟灰缸

translation.en: You still gotta put that out and get back to work.
translation.zh: 你还是得把烟掐了 回去继续工作

translation.en: Man, it's a three-quarter-mile walk to get outside.
translation.zh: 老兄 出去抽要走一公里多

translation.en: I said break time's over, Smokey.
translation.zh: 我说了 休息时间结束 烟鬼

translation.en: You know, they call 'em 20 for a reason.
translation.zh: 你知道 我们休息20分钟是有原因的

translation.en: And I got four minutes to go on my 20.
translation.zh: 我还有四分钟的时间才到20

translation.en: Are you pushing "Open"?
translation.zh: 你按了“开”吗？

translation.en: It doesn't say "Open," okay?
translation.zh: 没有写着“开”的按钮 好吗？

translation.en: It says "Start," but it won't open.
translation.zh: 上面写着“启动” 但是打不开

translation.en: Well, stop it.
translation.zh: 让它停下

translation.en: -What? -Stop it!
translation.zh: -什么？ -按停下！

translation.en: I thought we wanted it to start.
translation.zh: 我以为我们想启动这个

translation.en: We do, but it needs to stop.
translation.zh: 我们会的 但必须先停下

translation.en: So, not start?
translation.zh: 所以 不再启动吗？

translation.en: We need it to start,
translation.zh: 我们需要启动

translation.en: but we have to stop it so I can figure out why it won't open.
translation.zh: 但要先停下 我才能知道为什么这门不开

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 喂！

translation.en: Do you smell any smoke?
translation.zh: 你闻到烟味了吗？

translation.en: Smoke? No.
translation.zh: 烟味？没有

translation.en: All I smell is them racing fumes.
translation.zh: 我只闻到了赛车的尾气味

translation.en: All right, thanks. Go ahead.
translation.zh: 好吧 谢谢 你走吧

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: -Okay, get... -Three, two...
translation.zh: -好 把… -三、二…

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait, hold on.
translation.zh: 等等 等等 等一下

translation.en: Are we going on "one" or are we going on "go"?
translation.zh: 我们是喊“一”还是喊“开始”？

translation.en: Three.
translation.zh: 三

translation.en: No, we're going on "go"! Three, two...
translation.zh: 不 我们要喊“开始”！三、二…

translation.en: Hold on. Hold on. You're gonna rip it right off the track!
translation.zh: 等等 等一下 你会把它从轨道上扯下来的！

translation.en: The chain's jammed.
translation.zh: 这链子卡住了

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 行了

translation.en: Try it now.
translation.zh: 现在试试

translation.en: Come on. Let's go.
translation.zh: 来吧 我们走

translation.en: Let's go. Come on. We got to get you back.
translation.zh: 走吧 来吧 我们还要送你们回去

translation.en: Hey! Get down! I said I'd get it!
translation.zh: 喂！快下来！我说了我能搞定

translation.en: Come on, let's go!
translation.zh: 来吧 我们走！

translation.en: -You'll get it? -I'll get it, I swear.
translation.zh: -你能搞定吗？ -我会的 我发誓

translation.en: Come on. You gots to go.
translation.zh: 来吧 你必须要走了

translation.en: Let's go, big boy. Come on. Go, go.
translation.zh: 走吧 大家伙 来吧

translation.en: Hey! You can't just walk away from me. I own your ass!
translation.zh: 喂！你不能就这样甩开我 你要听我的！

translation.en: Not when I'm behind the wheel, you don't.
translation.zh: 开车的时候不用 你命令不了我

translation.en: Your contract says that I...
translation.zh: 你的合同上写了我…

translation.en: My contract says, "Love Handle Enterprises," that's you,
translation.zh: 我的合同上写了“热爱企业” 那是对你的要求

translation.en: "understands, acknowledges and agrees that Twin Darling Inc.", that's me,
translation.zh: “理解、承认并同意双子星公司” 这是对我的要求

translation.en: "is not a partner, employee, or joint venturer
translation.zh: 没有写“合伙人、员工或合营者

translation.en: with Love Handle Enterprises."
translation.zh: 也要热爱企业”

translation.en: Drivers in cars win races, Max.
translation.zh: 车手开车是为了赢得比赛 麦克斯

translation.en: Nobody's rooting for your drink to cross the finish line,
translation.zh: 没有人靠着你的饮料去赢得比赛

translation.en: so shut your pie-hole before I shut it for you.
translation.zh: 所以你最好在我帮你闭嘴之前先闭嘴

translation.en: Do you know what the words "stop payment" mean?
translation.zh: 你知道“停止赞助”是什么意思吗？

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 喂！

translation.en: You're that guy!
translation.zh: 你就是那个人！

translation.en: Mellie should have been back by now.
translation.zh: 梅莉现在应该已经回来了

translation.en: Well, Aunt Mellie normally does what she says she's gonna do.
translation.zh: 梅莉姑妈通常都是说到做到的

translation.en: Let's give her a few more minutes and hope she doesn't go all Logan,
translation.zh: 那我们再等她几分钟 希望她不会重蹈罗根家族的覆辙

translation.en: and become a total flake like the rest of them.
translation.zh: 变得和她家里人一样奇怪

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 好看

translation.en: All good?
translation.zh: 一切都好吗？

translation.en: Bumpy on the way out, but we're doing okay.
translation.zh: 在出来的路上遇到点麻烦 但我们现在没事了

translation.en: Where'd your arm go? I mean, your hand?
translation.zh: 你的胳膊去哪里了？我是说你的手？

translation.en: Can we haul ass?
translation.zh: 我们能走了吗？

translation.en: The cafeteria fire alarm just went off.
translation.zh: 食堂的火警警报响了

translation.en: Warden, we got to call this in.
translation.zh: 监狱长 我们需要叫支援

translation.en: We don't have fires at Monroe.
translation.zh: 在门罗我们没有火灾

translation.en: Sir, we don't know what kind of shape those guards are gonna be in.
translation.zh: 长官 我们不知道那些 当人质的狱警会怎么样

translation.en: I mean, they could be dead or worse by now.
translation.zh: 我是说 他们有可能已经死了 或是更糟

translation.en: And what do you reckon would be worse than dead?
translation.zh: 你觉得比死更糟的是什么？

translation.en: Shit! Call it in!
translation.zh: 该死！去叫人吧！

translation.en: We have a three-alarm fire at Monroe Correctional Facility.
translation.zh: 我们收到了门罗监狱发出的 三级火警警情

translation.en: Please respond immediately.
translation.zh: 请迅速支援

translation.en: They report a fire in a cafeteria.
translation.zh: 他们报告食堂发生火灾

translation.en: I repeat, a fire in the Monroe Correctional Facility cafeteria.
translation.zh: 重复 门罗监狱发生火灾

translation.en: Now, what are your words?
translation.zh: 刚才你说什么？

translation.en: Do not tell me you've been spraying her hair with this!
translation.zh: 别告诉我你一直 把这个喷在她头发上！

translation.en: This will turn her hair into an SOS pad.
translation.zh: 这会让她的头发变成紧急求生垫

translation.en: I was doing the best I could. You were late!
translation.zh: 我已经尽力挽救了 你迟到了！

translation.en: Like you never brushed your own daughter's hair before.
translation.zh: 感觉你好像从来没有 给你女儿梳过头一样

translation.en: I wish you all wouldn't fight. You're making me more nervous.
translation.zh: 我希望你们不要吵架 你们让我更紧张了

translation.en: You're right, baby doll.
translation.zh: 你说什么都对 亲爱的

translation.en: Is Daddy here?
translation.zh: 爸爸来了吗？

translation.en: I didn't see him. I was rushing.
translation.zh: 我没看到他 我很着急

translation.en: Did your daddy say he was coming?
translation.zh: 你爸爸说他要来吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Why?
translation.zh: 对 怎么了？

translation.en: I don't know. Just thought he was working.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我只是以为他在工作

translation.en: What? That job at the Speedway? I heard he got fired.
translation.zh: 什么？在赛车场的工作吗？ 我听说他被开除了

translation.en: Funny, how he never brought that up.
translation.zh: 有趣 他从来没提起过

translation.en: You look like a princess. You're gonna do great.
translation.zh: 你看起来像个公主 你会表现很好的

translation.en: I thought maybe you'd run off.
translation.zh: 我以为你会跑掉

translation.en: And leave you, beautiful? Never.
translation.zh: 离开你 美女？永远不会

translation.en: You know, we got caught on the other side of that there gate
translation.zh: 你知道 当封锁开始的时候

translation.en: when the lockdown happened.
translation.zh: 我们被关在了门那头

translation.en: It was terrifying.
translation.zh: 太可怕了

translation.en: For her talent, Sadie Logan will perform "Umbrella" by Rihanna.
translation.zh: 才艺表演 莎蒂·罗根带来蕾哈娜的《雨伞》

translation.en: I picked this song 'cause it's my daddy's favorite.
translation.zh: 我选这首歌是因为 这是我爸爸最喜欢的

translation.en: Almost heaven
translation.zh: 几乎是天堂

translation.zh: 西佛吉尼亚州

translation.zh: 蓝岭山脉

translation.en: Shenandoah River
translation.zh: 雪纳杜河

translation.en: Life is old there
translation.zh: 那里的生命

translation.en: Older than the trees
translation.zh: 比树木古老

translation.en: Younger than the mountains
translation.zh: 比群山年轻

translation.en: Growing like a breeze

translation.zh: 带我回家

translation.zh: 带我回家

translation.en: All my memories
translation.zh: 我的全部记忆

translation.en: Gathered 'round her
translation.zh: 都围绕着她

translation.en: Miner's lady
translation.zh: 矿工的妻子

translation.en: Stranger to blue water
translation.zh: 对大海陌生的人儿

translation.en: Dark and dusty
translation.zh: 天空灰蒙蒙

translation.en: Painted on the sky
translation.zh: 昏暗一片

translation.en: Misty taste of moonshine
translation.zh: 月光朦胧

translation.en: Teardrops in my eye
translation.zh: 双眼噙泪

translation.en: Country roads
translation.zh: 乡村小路

translation.zh: 带我回家

translation.en: To the place
translation.zh: 到我生长的

translation.en: I belong
translation.zh: 家乡
