translation.zh: 西佛吉尼亚州

translation.en: Mountain momma
translation.zh: 大山母亲

translation.en: Take me home
translation.zh: 乡村小路

translation.en: Country roads
translation.zh: 带我回家

translation.en: Where are you gonna put it?
translation.zh: 你想把这个放在哪儿？

translation.en: I can make a trophy case.
translation.zh: 我可以做一个奖杯柜

translation.en: You're gonna need to now, you've got so many.
translation.zh: 你现在就需要 你以后还有很多奖杯要放

translation.en: Give me a hug.
translation.zh: 给我抱一下

translation.en: -I love you, Daddy. -I love you, too.
translation.zh: -我爱你 爸爸 -我也爱你

translation.en: Let me see the gun show.
translation.zh: 让我看看力量

translation.en: -All right. -I love you.
translation.zh: -好了 -我爱你

translation.en: -Night, Jo. -See you, Jimmy.
translation.zh: -晚安 乔 -再见 吉米

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: -See you back at home, Bobbie. -All right.
translation.zh: -回家见 鲍比 -好

translation.en: What the heck?
translation.zh: 什么情况？

translation.en: What the hell happened to my car?
translation.zh: 我的车怎么了？

translation.en: Are you kidding me?
translation.zh: 是在逗我吗？

translation.en: Hey, partner. Where you headed to?
translation.zh: 喂 朋友 你要去哪儿？

translation.en: All the way through?
translation.zh: 一直到开到头？

translation.en: Mind if I catch a ride with you?
translation.zh: 我能搭个顺风车吗？

translation.en: You sure?
translation.zh: 你确定吗？

translation.en: Authorities have confirmed
translation.zh: 警方已经确认

translation.en: they have recovered the money stolen from the Charlotte Motor Speedway
translation.zh: 他们已经找回了赛车场被窃的现金

translation.en: in what some are calling the "Hillbilly Heist."
translation.zh: 他们有人称之为“乡巴佬抢劫案”

translation.en: Sources say an anonymous caller led police to this gas station
translation.zh: 有消息称有匿名举报者向警方举报

translation.en: where they discovered an abandoned truck containing bags of cash
translation.zh: 他们发现了一辆废弃卡车 里面藏匿了大量现金

translation.en: that have been positively linked to the robbery over the weekend.
translation.zh: 这些现金被证实 与前不久发生的抢劫案有关

translation.en: The truck was reported stolen last week.
translation.zh: 报告称这辆卡车于上周失窃

translation.en: Our forensic team is at work on the scene.
translation.zh: 我们的现场调查人员正在取证

translation.en: And we're certain they will find...
translation.zh: 我们相信他们会找到…

translation.en: Why go to all the trouble to rob a place
translation.zh: 如果没胆子留下那些钱

translation.en: if you don't have the guts to keep the money?
translation.zh: 为什么又要费半天劲去抢劫呢？

translation.en: He must've chickened out.
translation.zh: 他肯定是退缩了

translation.en: Well, we are joined now by a resident daredevil,
translation.zh: 我们今天有请到一位本地的冒险者

translation.en: at Little Victory Family Shelter.
translation.zh: 来自胜利家庭收养所

translation.en: This is Josh Morrison. Thank you for joining us today.
translation.zh: 这位是乔希·莫里森 感谢你今天加入我们

translation.en: Right. He comes on about, you know...
translation.zh: 没错 他常过来 你懂的…

translation.en: He used to come on a lot on Midday, for Pet of the Week.
translation.zh: 他过去中午常会过来 看看这周的宠物

translation.en: So, he's joining us to talk about a new adoption challenge
translation.zh: 所以 他会加入我们现在 对胜利家庭收养所

translation.en: at the shelter for Little Victories. We do have to talk about the...
translation.zh: 新收养规定的讨论

translation.en: Well, we brought everyone in at 6:00 this morning.
translation.zh: 我们今早六点就让所有人过来了

translation.en: Couldn't work all weekend, you know, 'cause of the race, obviously.
translation.zh: 我们不能周末还工作 你知道的 很显然 因为赛车的原因

translation.en: But everything was just like we left it on Friday.
translation.zh: 但是一切都和我们在周五离开时 没有区别

translation.en: How many men do you have working today?
translation.zh: 今天有多少人在工作？

translation.en: Well, 40 or so.
translation.zh: 40个左右

translation.en: I guess we're on a bit of a tight deadline,
translation.zh: 我想我们的时间有点紧

translation.en: 'cause they're trying to get everything shored up,
translation.zh: 因为赛季开始了 他们想要

translation.en: since the season's starting.
translation.zh: 其他的配套设施都跟上

translation.en: We'll be wrapping out of here this week.
translation.zh: 这里我们这周就能完工

translation.en: I'm gonna need prints from all your guys.
translation.zh: 我需要你们所有人的指纹

translation.en: Sure, but all the workers have to wear protective gloves at all times.
translation.zh: 好 但所有的工人 全程都带着防护手套

translation.en: That's... Well, it's a union rule.
translation.zh: 这是… 是工会规定

translation.en: -Union rules. -Yep.
translation.zh: -工会的规定 -对

translation.en: -Great. -Agent Grayson.
translation.zh: -很好 -格雷森探员

translation.en: Local PD got a call from someone claiming to be an eyewitness.
translation.zh: 当地警察接到一个 自称是目击证人的电话

translation.en: Swears they saw the robbers, can definitely identify 'em.
translation.zh: 他发誓他看见了那些劫匪 并可以指认出他们

translation.en: Yeah, I saw 'em. I know who they are, too.
translation.zh: 是的 我看到了 我也知道他们是谁

translation.en: Why don't we start at the beginning?
translation.zh: 你为什么不一开始就说？

translation.en: Where'd you see them?
translation.zh: 你在哪儿看到的他们？

translation.en: In a tunnel,
translation.zh: 在隧道里

translation.en: leading from the track back to the shower room and the lockers.
translation.zh: 从赛道返回浴室和储物柜区域的时候

translation.en: There's a saying in our business, "Set it up and shut up."
translation.zh: 我们这行有句俗话叫 “要么做好 要么闭嘴”

translation.en: So, I'll shut up.
translation.zh: 那我就闭嘴

translation.en: What the hell was that?
translation.zh: 那是怎么回事？

translation.en: You call yourself a driver?
translation.zh: 你还说你自己是个赛车手？

translation.en: What, you've never been boxed in a turn before?
translation.zh: 怎么 你从来没有在隧道里打过架吗？

translation.en: I told you I didn't wanna drink your poison.
translation.zh: 我说了我不想喝你的毒饮料

translation.en: -I thought I was having a heart attack! -That poison...
translation.zh: -我都要心脏病发作了！ -你说的毒饮料…

translation.en: Hey, can't one of you hit mute?
translation.zh: 喂 你们谁可以按下静音吗？

translation.en: I'm trying to give my statement to the FBI here.
translation.zh: 我在和联邦调查局的人录口供

translation.en: There was two of 'em, right?
translation.zh: 他们有两个人 好吗？

translation.en: Now, one of 'em was the bartender from that place out off of I-17.
translation.zh: 其中一个是17号州际公路那儿的酒保

translation.en: Got one arm.
translation.zh: 只有一只手

translation.en: The guy with him, I don't know who he was.
translation.zh: 跟他一起的那个人 我不认识他是谁

translation.en: And you know the bartender from?
translation.zh: 你怎么认识那个酒保的？

translation.en: A while back, I got in a fight at the bar.
translation.zh: 前阵子我在酒吧打过架

translation.en: -With the bartender? -No, with his brother.
translation.zh: -和酒保吗？ -不是 是和他哥哥

translation.en: Did the brother have one arm or two?
translation.zh: 他哥哥是一只还是两只手？

translation.en: The brother's got both.
translation.zh: 他哥哥是两只手

translation.en: And the fight was about?
translation.zh: 是因为什么打架？

translation.en: I can't remember.
translation.zh: 我不记得了

translation.en: And you won that fight at the bar?
translation.zh: 你在酒吧打赢了？

translation.en: Hell, yeah, I won it.
translation.zh: 当然了 我赢了

translation.en: So, you saw the bartender with one arm,
translation.zh: 所以 在比赛时你在隧道里

translation.en: and an unknown male companion in the tunnel during the race?
translation.zh: 又看见那个独臂的酒保 和一个不认识的男性一起

translation.en: And they were...
translation.zh: 他们当时在…

translation.en: Well, they was just walking, but it was suspicious, like.
translation.zh: 他们只是路过 但感觉很可疑

translation.en: Suspicious how?
translation.zh: 怎么可疑？

translation.en: They shouldn't have been down there. That was suspicious.
translation.zh: 他们本来不应该在那里 这就很可疑

translation.en: But you didn't think to mention this encounter to anyone
translation.zh: 但你没有向任何人提起这次相遇

translation.en: until you saw the news on the television about the robbery?
translation.zh: 直到你看见电视上关于抢劫的新闻？

translation.en: The docs had to set my nose, all right? I've been in recovery.
translation.zh: 医生要治疗我的鼻子 好吗？ 我还在康复

translation.en: So, all these injuries are the result of your latest fight with the brothers?
translation.zh: 那这些伤是你和那对兄弟 打架留下的吗？

translation.en: Bartender brother. He's the one that punched me in the tunnel.
translation.zh: 是那个酒保 他是在隧道里打我的人

translation.en: The one-arm?
translation.zh: 独臂的那个？

translation.en: Yeah, look, just ask my driver, Dayton White.
translation.zh: 是的 听着 可以去问问我的车手 丹尼·怀特

translation.en: He was with me when all this went down. He'll back up my story.
translation.zh: 这些事情发生时他一直和我在一起 他可以证明我说的

translation.en: Yes, when you called in your tip,
translation.zh: 是的 当你打电话时

translation.en: you mentioned that he'd be able to corroborate your story.
translation.zh: 你说丹尼怀特能够证实你的说辞

translation.en: We spoke with Dayton White earlier today.
translation.zh: 所以我们今天已经和他聊过了

translation.en: He stated he was never in the tunnel with you during the race.
translation.zh: 他说他从来没有和你在隧道里过

translation.en: Never saw two suspicious men.
translation.zh: 也没有看见过两位可疑的人

translation.en: And has no idea what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 而且他也不知道你在说什么

translation.en: Did you talk to him?
translation.zh: 你和他聊过了吗？

translation.en: I think he knows better.
translation.zh: 我想他更清楚

translation.en: I stopped by the trailer when he wasn't home.
translation.zh: 我趁他不在家的时候去了拖车那里

translation.en: I think I got most of your stuff.
translation.zh: 我拿走了很多你的东西

translation.en: You sure love your books.
translation.zh: 你真的很喜欢你的书

translation.en: And there's some mail there, too.
translation.zh: 还有一些邮件

translation.en: Visitation logs...
translation.zh: 访客记录上…

translation.en: indicate that Jimmy Logan, an employee,
translation.zh: 写着吉米·罗根 一位前雇员

translation.en: recently fired from the Speedway,
translation.zh: 最近被赛车场开除

translation.en: came with his brother, Clyde, to see Joseph Bang here,
translation.zh: 他和他的兄弟克莱德在4月15号

translation.en: on April 15th.
translation.zh: 去找过乔·邦

translation.en: They returned two days later for a second visit. Now...
translation.zh: 他们两天后又去了一次 现在…

translation.en: We only have video of this meeting, no audio,
translation.zh: 我们只有他们见面的视频 没有音频

translation.en: so, we have no idea what they discussed.
translation.zh: 所以 我们不知道他们的谈话内容

translation.en: But the following week,
translation.zh: 但在接下来的那周

translation.en: Clyde Logan drives through the window of a Corner Save Mart,
translation.zh: 克莱德·罗根驾驶汽车 冲进了街角购物中心的橱窗

translation.en: and ends up being sentenced to 90 days here.
translation.zh: 最终被判90天的有期徒刑

translation.en: You seem to have a lot of information in your FBI folders there.
translation.zh: 你的联邦调查局的资料夹里 似乎有很多信息

translation.en: And so?
translation.zh: 所以呢？

translation.en: You don't think that's an incredible coincidence?
translation.zh: 你不觉得这是个惊人的巧合吗？

translation.en: No. Not really.
translation.zh: 不觉得啊

translation.en: I mean, if you're asking me, am I shocked
translation.zh: 我是说 如果你问我的话 我会不会

translation.en: that the criminals locked up in here are friends with other criminals?
translation.zh: 因为被关在这里的囚犯恰好是 其他罪犯的朋友而大吃一惊？

translation.en: No, I'm not.
translation.zh: 不会 我不会

translation.en: So, Clyde Logan and Joseph Bang were incarcerated here,
translation.zh: 克莱德·罗根和乔·邦 一直被关在这里

translation.en: at your prison, on May the 28th.
translation.zh: 在你的监狱里 在5月28号这一天

translation.en: And you had no problems,
translation.zh: 而你的监狱在那天一切正常

translation.en: no issues of any kind at your prison on that day?
translation.zh: 没有出现任何情况吗？

translation.en: Is that right?
translation.zh: 对吗？

translation.en: No, we didn't have any problems.
translation.zh: 没有 我们没出现任何问题

translation.en: Right. 'Cause Monroe County Fire Department said
translation.zh: 好吧 根据门罗消防部门所说

translation.en: they dispatched multiple units around 8:30 p.m. that night.
translation.zh: 他们在晚上八点半左右 向你们这里派出消防员

translation.en: There was a small kitchen fire,
translation.zh: 不过是一点厨房小火灾

translation.en: but that's not a problem in the context of this prison.
translation.zh: 但监狱内部没有出现问题

translation.en: I mean, it's standard operating procedure
translation.zh: 我是说 那只是标准流程

translation.en: for them to dispatch multiple units any time there's a fire at the prison.
translation.zh: 如果监狱里出现了火灾 无论规模他们都要派人来

translation.en: That was no big deal. It was out within a few minutes.
translation.zh: 不算什么事 几分钟就搞定了

translation.en: You're certain that these two inmates couldn't have broken out of here,
translation.zh: 你确定那两个犯人 没有在你不知情的情况下

translation.en: robbed the Speedway,
translation.zh: 逃出这里

translation.en: and then broken back into your prison without you knowing about it?
translation.zh: 去抢劫赛车场 再跑回你的监狱吗？

translation.en: Wow!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Agent Grayson, I've been warden here for nine years,
translation.zh: 格雷森探员 我在这里当了九年监狱长

translation.en: and I can tell you this.
translation.zh: 我可以告诉你

translation.en: We don't have an escape problem at Monroe.
translation.zh: 我们在门罗没有人能越狱

translation.en: What do you think of the robbery?
translation.zh: 你对这次抢劫有什么看法？

translation.en: Well, I heard that they're calling it "Ocean's 7-11,"
translation.zh: 我听说这次事件被称为“海洋便利店”

translation.en: 'cause they found that truck with the money behind a convenience store.
translation.zh: 因为他们在一家便利店后面 发现的那辆卡车

translation.en: I heard that they're calling 'em the Redneck Robbers,
translation.zh: 但我听说这次事件 被称为乡巴佬抢劫案

translation.en: 'cause they think the guys who did this whole thing are from around here.
translation.zh: 因为他们觉得 是来自我们这儿的人干的

translation.en: I hope they never catch 'em.
translation.zh: 我希望他们永远抓不到犯人

translation.en: Where does this investigation stand?
translation.zh: 这次调查从哪里开始？

translation.en: Let me tell you this. Even though the crime was committed in Charlotte,
translation.zh: 我这么告诉你吧 即使案件是在这里发生的

translation.en: the fact that the money was recovered here makes it a very serious matter.
translation.zh: 事实上钱也是在这里被找回的 请不要忽略这一点

translation.en: We're involving all of our local, state, and federal...
translation.zh: 我们所有的本地人都参与进来 还有州政府、联邦政府…

translation.en: You have a problem with the food here, inmate?
translation.zh: 你觉得这里的食物有问题吗 囚犯？

translation.en: No, no, no, Warden. No problem.
translation.zh: 没有 监狱长 没问题

translation.en: Reckon your stomach's not been bothering you lately?
translation.zh: 估计你的肠胃最近没有困扰到你吧？

translation.en: No, Warden, no.
translation.zh: 没有 监狱长 没有

translation.en: Thank you for asking me.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的关心

translation.en: You best be cleaning up your mess.
translation.zh: 你最好把这里收拾干净

translation.en: -Now! -Sir.
translation.zh: -快点！ -长官

translation.en: What'd you say to me, inmate?
translation.zh: 你刚才对我说什么 囚犯？

translation.en: Go on.
translation.zh: 进去吧

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: What about the disgruntled fired employee?
translation.zh: 那个被开除的雇员呢？

translation.en: The brother of the one-armed bartender?
translation.zh: 独臂酒保的哥哥吗？

translation.en: Jimmy Logan was fired six weeks before the robbery.
translation.zh: 吉米·洛根在劫案前六个月 就被开除了

translation.en: His brother, Clyde, is the one-armed bartender
translation.zh: 他的弟弟 克莱德 就是那个独臂酒保

translation.en: Max Chilblain claims to have seen during the race.
translation.zh: 麦克斯声称在比赛的时候见到他们了

translation.en: But we know there's no way Clyde Logan could've been in that underground walkway,
translation.zh: 但我们知道克莱德·罗根 当时不可能在地下走廊里

translation.en: because he was serving time at the Monroe Correctional Facility
translation.zh: 因为在抢劫案的当天

translation.en: on the day of the robbery.
translation.zh: 他还在门罗监狱里服刑

translation.en: I hate airtight alibis.
translation.zh: 我讨厌完美的不在场证明

translation.en: Where did Jimmy Logan's cell phone tell us he was during the race?
translation.zh: 吉米·罗根的手机在比赛期间 显示他在哪儿？

translation.en: Jimmy Logan doesn't have a cell phone.
translation.zh: 吉米·罗根没有手机

translation.en: Shut off three months ago for non-payment.
translation.zh: 三个月前就因为欠费停机了

translation.en: He also drives a 1983 Ford F-150,
translation.zh: 他的车是一辆83年的福特F-150

translation.en: so no GPS.
translation.zh: 所以也没有GPS定位

translation.en: No email, no social media.
translation.zh: 没有电子邮箱 没有社交网络

translation.en: We did get a few hits on his name on other social media accounts,
translation.zh: 我们在网上找到了很少一部分 关于他的信息

translation.en: which place him at Valley View High School during the race.
translation.zh: 显示他在比赛期间位于河谷高中

translation.en: His daughter was competing in the Miss Pretty West Virginia Pageant.
translation.zh: 她女儿在那里参加 西弗吉尼亚州小姐的选美比赛

translation.en: And apparently, she won.
translation.zh: 显然她赢了

translation.en: How's your brother?
translation.zh: 你哥哥怎么样了？

translation.en: I wouldn't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: -You haven't talked to him? -Nope.
translation.zh: -你没跟他聊过吗？ -没有

translation.en: Not once?
translation.zh: 一次都没有？

translation.en: Nope.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Well, it seems strange, you know,
translation.zh: 听起来很奇怪 你要知道

translation.en: you two being so close and all.
translation.zh: 你们俩一直挺亲密的

translation.en: Last I heard, he moved south to be closer to his daughter.
translation.zh: 我最近一次听说 他搬去南边了 为了离他女儿近一点

translation.en: -How far south? -Lynchburg.
translation.zh: -有多往南？ -在林奇堡

translation.en: Guess his ex moved down there when her husband opened a new car lot.
translation.zh: 我猜他前妻因为她现任 开了一家新停车场搬去那里了

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 好吧…

translation.en: If you do speak to him...
translation.zh: 如果你有机会跟他说话…

translation.en: Tell him I'd like to talk to him.
translation.zh: 告诉他我想找他聊聊

translation.en: I doubt I'll be talking to him.
translation.zh: 我可能没什么机会跟他说话了

translation.en: He never told you why he gave all that money back?
translation.zh: 他从没告诉过你 他为什么要把钱还回去吗？

translation.en: On the house.
translation.zh: 算我请你

translation.en: Generous.
translation.zh: 够大方

translation.en: You've had your six months, and you made no arrests.
translation.zh: 你用完了六个月的期限 还没有抓到人

translation.en: Meanwhile, the locals talk about these thieves
translation.zh: 同时 当地警察好像把那些劫匪

translation.en: like they're some type of Hee Haw heroes.
translation.zh: 当作了什么劫富济贫的英雄

translation.en: So, we would like to move forward,
translation.zh: 所以 我们想要向前看

translation.en: and put this entire incident in our rearview mirror, if you will.
translation.zh: 把这整件事当作我们的前车之鉴 如果你们愿意

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: Thank you again.
translation.zh: 再次谢谢你们

translation.en: I do have one last question.
translation.zh: 我还有最后一个问题

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: You just said you received a payout from your insurance company
translation.zh: 你刚刚说你从保险公司那里

translation.en: for the money that wasn't recovered.
translation.zh: 收到了损失的赔偿

translation.en: Yes. That's right.
translation.zh: 是的 没错

translation.en: We were here with forensic accountants for weeks,
translation.zh: 我们和法务会计在这里工作了数周

translation.en: poring over the register logs and receipts.
translation.zh: 查了所有的登记和收据

translation.en: No one here was ever able to give us an exact accounting
translation.zh: 但没有人可以给我们

translation.en: of how much money was actually stolen.
translation.zh: 一个损失金额的具体数字

translation.en: Right. Well, it's very complex.
translation.zh: 对 这很复杂

translation.en: The algorithm and whatnot.
translation.zh: 包括算法和其他一些

translation.en: Yeah. We heard about the complicated algorithms.
translation.zh: 是的 我们听说过你们复杂的算法

translation.en: So, how did you arrive at the number to ask for,
translation.zh: 但如果你们不知道确切的金额

translation.en: if you didn't know how much was stolen?
translation.zh: 又怎么申请保险赔偿的数额呢？

translation.en: I'm not an accountant, so, I wasn't in there for those discussions.
translation.zh: 我不是会计 所以我不会参与关于这个的讨论

translation.en: But as far as all of us here at Charlotte Motor Speedway are concerned,
translation.zh: 但就我们赛车场的所有人来说

translation.en: the matter has been resolved to our satisfaction.
translation.zh: 这件事被圆满地解决了 我们很满意

translation.en: Assholes.
translation.zh: 混蛋

translation.en: You seriously want to trust these two with our lives?
translation.zh: 你确定要把生命托付给这俩个人吗？

translation.en: They're gonna know what we want 'em to know.
translation.zh: 他们只会知道我们想告诉他们的

translation.en: -All right! -But we can get two more.
translation.zh: -好了！ -但我们可以再搞两袋

translation.en: What's rule eight?
translation.zh: 第八条规则是什么？

translation.en: -Don't get greedy. -Right, you're done here.
translation.zh: -别贪心 -好了 已经结束了

translation.en: Come on, you gotta get the car anyway. Go!
translation.zh: 来吧 你还要把车开走呢 去吧！

translation.en: Yeah, you're right there.
translation.zh: 对 你已经到了

translation.en: You're right on top of it. Just dig in there.
translation.zh: 你就在上面 从那儿开挖就行

translation.en: Mr. Naaman?
translation.zh: 纳曼先生？

translation.en: This one's addressed to you.
translation.zh: 这个是给你的

translation.en: Came in through the donation box.
translation.zh: 是从捐款箱拿过来的

translation.en: It's heavy, but don't get excited.
translation.zh: 很重 但先别激动

translation.en: It's got to be from a crazy, written with crayon.
translation.zh: 一定是哪个疯子送的 用蜡笔写的

translation.en: Where to, Mr. Naaman?
translation.zh: 去哪儿 纳曼先生？

translation.en: -Hey. -Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨 -你好

translation.en: New job?
translation.zh: 新工作？

translation.en: Yeah. It's just seasonal.
translation.zh: 对 只是临时的而已

translation.en: I hope they keep me on, though. It's nice being close to home.
translation.zh: 但我还是希望他们能长期雇佣 还是离家近点好

translation.en: You want to come in?
translation.zh: 你想进来吗？

translation.en: No, no. I'll just wait.
translation.zh: 不用 我等着就行

translation.en: -Daddy! -Hey! What's up, man?
translation.zh: -爸爸！ -嗨！怎么样 小家伙？

translation.en: Body slam!
translation.zh: 抱摔！

translation.en: What time you want her back?
translation.zh: 你想让她什么时候回来？

translation.en: Whatever time works best for you.
translation.zh: 你方便的时候送她回来就行

translation.en: -We're just around. -All right.
translation.zh: -我们就在附近 -好

translation.en: Don't wait up!
translation.zh: 不用等我了！

translation.en: All right. So, I was thinking putt-putt golf.
translation.zh: 好吧 所以 推杆高尔夫怎么样

translation.en: They got those new go-karts down there.
translation.zh: 那里还有新的卡丁车

translation.en: Sure. As long as we get gelato after.
translation.zh: 行啊 只要玩完之后再吃意式冰淇淋

translation.en: -Gelato? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -意式冰淇淋？ -对

translation.en: Ain't that like fancy ice-cream?
translation.zh: 那不就是花哨些冰淇淋吗？

translation.en: I thought you couldn't do that 'cause of your pageants.
translation.zh: 我还以为你因为参加选美比赛 就不吃了呢

translation.en: I'm over all that stuff.
translation.zh: 我受够了那些比赛了

translation.en: I've been really getting into the culinary arts lately.
translation.zh: 我最近真的很喜欢烹饪

translation.en: Cul... What?
translation.zh: 不错…什么？

translation.en: Cooking! I've been watching a lot of Top Chef.
translation.zh: 烹饪！我看了很多期《顶级大厨》

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -对

translation.en: I've been learning a lot.
translation.zh: 我学到了很多呢

translation.en: Like, how gelato isn't just fancy ice-cream.
translation.zh: 比如 意式冰淇淋不只是 花哨的冰淇淋那么简单

translation.en: It's made at a slower churn rate than ice-cream,
translation.zh: 它的搅拌速度要比正常冰淇淋更慢

translation.en: so less air gets mixed in.
translation.zh: 这样才不会有太多空气进去

translation.en: That's why it has such a silky texture.
translation.zh: 所以才会有那么柔滑的口感

translation.en: -A churn rate? -Yeah, a churn rate.
translation.zh: -搅拌速度？ -是的 搅拌速度

translation.en: How fast the paddle in the machine moves.
translation.zh: 就是桨在机器里移动地多快

translation.en: Sometimes the paddle is called a dasher.
translation.zh: 有时候桨也叫做搅拌器

translation.en: Oh, yeah, no, I know what that is. Dasher.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道那是什么 搅拌器

translation.en: It's kinda like Dasher and Dancer and Vixen.
translation.zh: 搅拌器听着像是搅局的泼妇

translation.en: No. Daddy!
translation.zh: 不是 爸爸！

translation.en: -I know exactly what that is. -No, it's not that.
translation.zh: -我知道那是什么 -不是那样的

translation.en: I didn't know that reindeer made ice cream.
translation.zh: 我不知道原来驯鹿也会做冰淇淋

translation.en: They don't!
translation.zh: 它们不会！

translation.en: You funny.
translation.zh: 你真好笑

translation.en: You funny. You funny-looking.
translation.zh: 你才好笑 你看着就好笑

translation.en: You never told me how you knew the coast was clear,
translation.zh: 你从来没告诉过我 你知道海岸是安全的

translation.en: and we could go get the money.
translation.zh: 我们可以去拿到钱

translation.en: Well, you know how that phone company
translation.zh: 你知道电话公司

translation.en: gave you about 60 days to pay that phone bill?
translation.zh: 会给你60天的时间去付电话账单吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Well, you go one day over and they shut your phone off.
translation.zh: 你超过一天 他们就会停了你的机

translation.en: So?
translation.zh: 所以呢？

translation.en: I ain't paid the bill out at the trailer in, like, six months.
translation.zh: 我已经六个月没在拖车那边缴费了

translation.en: So?
translation.zh: 所以？

translation.en: I figured long as they was tapping my phone, they'd keep it on.
translation.zh: 我在想他们什么时候会给我停机 他们始终还留着服务

translation.en: About a week ago, it finally went dead.
translation.zh: 大概一周前 终于给我停机了

translation.en: -That's pretty good. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -那太好了 -是啊

translation.en: You came up with that on your own?
translation.zh: 你是自己想出来的吗？

translation.en: Yes, I did.
translation.zh: 对 是的

translation.en: Well, that's a lot of thinking for a Logan.
translation.zh: 罗根家的人能想这么多真不容易

translation.en: -Hey, Jimmy. -Hey.
translation.zh: -嗨 吉米 -嗨

translation.en: What you doing?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: So, Mellie...
translation.zh: 所以 梅莉…

translation.en: What do you make of all this Logan Curse stuff?
translation.zh: 你对所谓的罗根家族诅咒 有什么看法？

translation.en: Well, that's Clyde's thing. I never really gave it that much thought.
translation.zh: 那是克莱德要考虑的 我从来没想过这个问题

translation.en: What about you? You think we're destined to repeat the past?
translation.zh: 那你呢？ 你觉得我们注定要重蹈覆辙吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 并不会

translation.en: I'm all about the future.
translation.zh: 我只关心未来

translation.en: Shoot. Sorry about that. Another special for the lady?
translation.zh: 干杯 抱歉 给这位女士再来一杯吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I missed out on the toast.
translation.zh: 对 我忘了说祝酒词

translation.en: You know, they say it's bad luck to toast with an empty glass.
translation.zh: 你知道 他们说用空杯干杯不吉利

translation.en: They do say that.
translation.zh: 他们是这么说的

translation.en: It's also bad luck to toast alone, so,
translation.zh: 一个人自己干杯也不吉利 所以

translation.en: why don't you pour yourself one on me?
translation.zh: 为什么你不给我也倒一杯呢？

translation.en: So you don't jinx me.
translation.zh: 所以你别让我倒霉啊

translation.en: I would have remembered if you'd ever been in the bar before.
translation.zh: 如果你以前来过酒吧 我会记得的

translation.en: -Are you just passing through? -Yeah. Passing through.
translation.zh: -你只是路过吗？ -对 路过

translation.en: But I'm hoping to stay a while.
translation.zh: 但我希望能留下来一阵子

translation.en: Well, then...
translation.zh: 好吧 那么…

translation.en: Here's to staying a while.
translation.zh: 为了你要留下来干杯
